Question: MassRobotics CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MassRobotics

Autonomous Mobile Robot Standards at CES 2024

- The MassRobotics AMR Interoperability Working Group has developed a standard to guide robotic automation interoperability, allowing robots from different vendors to share status information and operational conventions on warehouse or factory floors.
- The standard aims to enable organizations to deploy AMRs from multiple vendors to work together in the same environment, improving warehouse and factory automation.
- The group's focus is on basic robot-to-robot information sharing, with discussions on data points, messaging/transport methods, and message format.
- The standard will be trialed at a FedEx facility where AMRs from different vendors will operate in the same area.
- Members of the working group and contributors to the standard include Vecna Robotics, 6 River Systems, Waypoint Robotics, Locus Robotics, Seegrid, MiR, Autoguide Mobile Robots, Third Wave Automation, A3, and Open Robotics.
Summary_cn:
MassRobotics

CES 2024年自主移动机器人标准

- MassRobotics AMR互操作性工作组已经制定了一个标准，以指导机器人自动化的互操作性，使来自不同供应商的机器人能够在仓库或工厂车间共享状态信息和操作约定。
- 该标准旨在使组织能够部署来自多个供应商的AMR在同一环境中共同运作，提高仓库和工厂的自动化水平。
- 该工作组的重点是基本机器人之间的信息共享，并就数据点、消息传递/传输方法和消息格式进行讨论。
- 这个标准将在一个联邦快递设施进行试点，不同供应商的AMR将在同一区域内运行。
- 参与工作组和为该标准做出贡献的成员包括Vecna Robotics、6 River Systems、Waypoint Robotics、Locus Robotics、Seegrid、MiR、Autoguide Mobile Robots、Third Wave Automation、A3和Open Robotics。
